org.jdesktop.animation.timing
Class KeyTimes

java.lang.Object
  org.jdesktop.animation.timing.KeyTimes

public class KeyTimes
extends java.lang.Object

Stores a list of times from 0 to 1 that are used in calculating interpolated values for ObjectModifier given a matching set of KeyValues and possibly KeySplines for those times. In the simplest case, a KeyFrame will consist of just two times in KeyTimes: 0 and 1.

Constructor Detail

KeyTimes

public KeyTimes(float... times)
Creates a new instance of KeyTimes. Times should be in increasing order and should all be in the range [0,1], with the first value being zero and the last being 1

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Time values must be ordered in increasing value, the first value must be 0 and the last value must be 1
